content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what is the highest price you are willing to pay? Tell me the exact number.
name: Max Müller

content: The highest price I am willing to pay is 800€ per month.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did the negotiation end without reaching an agreement?
name: Max Müller

content: The negotiation ended without reaching an agreement because we could not agree on the monthly rent. Peter wanted 900€ per month, and I was only willing to pay 800€ per month. We could not find a middle ground.
name: Evaluator

content: Is there anything else you would like to add regarding the negotiation?
name: Max Müller

content: No, I think I have covered everything regarding the negotiation.
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you for your time. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Max Müller
